channel.title: Cookies on Juan Orozco
channel.description: Recent content in Cookies on Juan Orozco

item.title: Cake Mix Hack: Rocky Road Cookies
item.description: As the resident stay at home parent, I am now in charge of many house duties.   Fixing the bed?   Me.   Cleaning? Always has been me.   Animal caretaker?   Me.   Cooking?   Me.   (I'm so gonna get hell for that second one.)   I don't mind these responsibilities, as a matter of fact, I enjoy most of them.   Especially cooking.   I'm not sure what it is, probably something to do with my geekyness, but I have so much fun creating meals from ingredients.
